title: How to Etch a Silicon Wafer Using Buffered Oxide Etch (BOE 6:1)
tools: BOE 6:1 solution (6 parts NH₄F : 1 part HF)
steps: Measure oxide thickness with ellipsometry or profilometer (baseline).
Pour 200 mL of BOE 6:1 into a HF-compatible etch bath (e.g., polypropylene).
Submerge wafer in the solution using a Teflon holder.
Etch time for 1000 Å oxide: 1.0–1.3 minutes at 25°C (etch rate ~800 Å/min).
Agitate gently every 15 seconds to avoid bubble pinning.
Rinse wafer in DI water for 60 seconds in overflow bath.
Dry with N₂ gun at 30 psi. Re-measure oxide thickness to confirm removal.
